评论详情: idk why the straps were designed like that to where they don't have anything attached to the end, or even connected to the little buckles or whatever, but it’s still cute.
I'm a high school student and I bought this backpack because it was so cute and I love strawberries but when I put a couple notebooks in it after two weeks, the right strap broke.

I’ve been using this backpack for college and I only go to classes two days out of the week. I don’t have much in here, maybe a laptop, ipad with a keyboard and two notebooks and a pencil case. It started ripping on me the second day of class so i took some of the things out. It’s very cute, but the material isn’t good or made to last.

评论概述: It’s the best backpack I’ve seen in a long time
评论详情: Love the design and it’s high quality
